column5: Be careful people...
The next few weeks are going be insane, lol!  Stay safe man!
Looks prime.
I'd love to see what Swift Rapids looks like right now.  must just be roaring!
Everyone must be down at the Graveyard pool
Same story pretty much all across southern ON right now. Fun stuff eh?  S.
I'd love to see what Swift Rapids looks like right now.  must just be roaring!  Big Chute must be coming out almost horizontal, lol!
That's even worse then when I made my first trip up to meet ya Dave. WOW  Thanks for the heads up Dave. Saved some gas.    Plan B for Thursday.
Nice to see some water in the Left Dam  Gonna be lots of debris floating around in the lakes this spring once this event ends. Be careful out there.......
Looks prime.  What sort of shotting pattern would you recommend? Maybe start with a lb or so nearest the hook?

Big Chute must be coming out almost horizontal, lol! The overflow channel from the power dam... l will be right up to the top I'm sure.  You know what..  I may go up Friday morning for a look with Alex.  I think he would love to see that.

i was in the trailer park yesterday and there were bows swimming around the campfire pits...lol..at the top of the chute on the highside there is one row of the grate exposed and inside the ladder is a straight flow....there is no indication inside that it is a ladder at all....i have pictures of Mill Dam from yesterday completely submerged and not even registering a ripple on the surface of the river ..water level is at the bottom of the Paisley bridge...Sauble River looks like the Saugeen's normal appearance....
What sort of shotting pattern would you recommend? Maybe start with a lb or so nearest the hook? Bottom bounce with a ten pound cannonball
My mechanic is about to lose his cottage on Kennebec lake due to flooding.
Here is a few still images along the Saugeen...        This is Mill Dam (between the two buildings)

Here is a few still images along the Saugeen...        This is Mill Dam (between the two buildings)       Holy crap that's the highest I've ever seen the Teeswater. All up by the next dam upstream roads have got to be underwater
THey were all closed ...as well as a few streets in Paisley....Most of north Walkerton streets were under water too....Insurance claims are running ramant..
Arrrr  There be fish in dem waters.....
THey were all closed ...as well as a few streets in Paisley....Most of north Walkerton streets were under water too....Insurance claims are running ramant.. My moms old place is probably underwater.
Bottom bounce with a ten pound cannonball  yeah, that oughta tick bottom every now and then!!
